title.rendered: City and Islington lecturer awarded £44k for constructive dismissal

content.rendered: Kevin Hope wins a complaint of constructive dismissal against the Capital City College Group.

excerpt.rendered: Kevin Hope wins a complaint of constructive dismissal against the Capital City College Group.
